public ref class XNodeEqualityComparer sealed : System::Collections::Generic::IEqualityComparer<System::Xml::Linq::XNode ^>, System::Collections::IEqualityComparer

summary.span: 比較節點以判斷它們是否相等。

span.span: Compares nodes to determine whether they are equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別的目的是要實作和。The purpose of this class is to implement and . 需要身分識別的類別 (例如) 需要實作這些介面的其中一個類別的執行個體。Classes that require identity (such as ) require an instance of a class that implements one of these interfaces.

span.span: Compares the values of two nodes.
A indicating if the nodes are equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下列準則判斷兩個節點是否相等：The following criteria determine whether two nodes are equal: - A`null`節點是否等於另一個`null`節點但不相等為非`null`節點。A `null` node is equal to another `null` node but unequal to a non-`null` node. - 兩個不同類型的物件是否不相等。Two objects of different types are never equal. - 兩個節點是否相等，如果它們包含相同的文字。Two nodes are equal if they contain the same text. - 兩個節點相等，如果它們有相同的標記名稱相同的相同的值的屬性集，且 （忽略註解和處理指示），包含兩個等長的成對等的序列內容節點。Two nodes are equal if they have the same tag name, the same set of attributes with the same values, and (ignoring comments and processing instructions), contain two equal-length sequences of pairwise equal content nodes. - 兩個物件是否相等，其根節點是否相等。Two objects are equal if their root nodes are equal. - 兩個節點是否相等，如果它們包含相同的註解文字。Two nodes are equal if they contain the same comment text. - 兩個節點是否相等，如果它們有相同的目標和資料。Two nodes are equal if they have the same target and data. - 兩個節點相等如果具有相同名稱、 公用識別碼、 系統識別碼和內部子集。Two nodes are equal if the have the same name, public ID, system ID, and internal subset. ## Examples 下列範例會使用這個類別來比較兩個節點。The following example uses this class to compare two nodes. ```csharp XElement xmlTree1 = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att1", 1), new XAttribute("Att2", 2), new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", "some content") ); XElement xmlTree2 = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att1", 1), new XAttribute("Att2", 2), new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", "some content") ); XNodeEqualityComparer equalityComparer = new XNodeEqualityComparer(); Console.WriteLine(equalityComparer.Equals(xmlTree1, xmlTree2)); xmlTree2.Add(new XElement("NewChild", "new content")); Console.WriteLine(equalityComparer.Equals(xmlTree1, xmlTree2)); ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` True False ```

summary.span: 根據 傳回雜湊程式碼。

span.span: Returns a hash code based on an .

returns.span: ，包含節點之以值為基礎的雜湊程式碼。

span.span: A that contains a value-based hash code for the node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作節點的參考識別為基礎。The implementation of is based on the referential identity of the node. 這個方法會計算節點和所有子系的值為基礎的深層的雜湊碼。This method computes a deep hash code based on the value of the node and all descendants. 雜湊程式碼會反映所有屬性以及所有下階節點。The hash code reflects all attributes and all descendent nodes. ## Examples 下列範例會使用這個方法，取得 XML 樹狀結構的深度雜湊碼。The following example uses this method to get a deep hash code for an XML tree. ```csharp XElement xmlTree = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att1", 1), new XAttribute("Att2", 2), new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", "some content") ); XNodeEqualityComparer equalityComparer = new XNodeEqualityComparer(); Console.WriteLine("HashCode: {0}", equalityComparer.GetHashCode(xmlTree).ToString("X")); xmlTree.Add(new XElement("NewChild", "new content")); Console.WriteLine("HashCode: {0}", equalityComparer.GetHashCode(xmlTree).ToString("X")); ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` HashCode: 958CCD0 HashCode: AD26516B ```

span.span: if the nodes are equal; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下列準則判斷兩個節點是否相等：The following criteria determine whether two nodes are equal: - A`null`節點是否等於另一個`null`節點但不相等為非`null`節點。A `null` node is equal to another `null` node but unequal to a non-`null` node. - 兩個不同類型的物件是否不相等。Two objects of different types are never equal. - 兩個節點是否相等，如果它們包含相同的文字。Two nodes are equal if they contain the same text. - 兩個節點相等，如果它們有相同的標記名稱相同的相同的值的屬性集和 （忽略註解和處理指示），包含兩個 equa 長度序列成對等的內容節點。Two nodes are equal if they have the same tag name, the same set of attributes with the same values, and (ignoring comments and processing instructions), contain two equa-length sequences of pairwise equal content nodes. - 兩個物件是否相等，其根節點是否相等。Two objects are equal if their root nodes are equal. - 兩個節點是否相等，如果它們包含相同的註解文字。Two nodes are equal if they contain the same comment text. - 兩個節點是否相等，如果它們有相同的目標和資料。Two nodes are equal if they have the same target and data. - 兩個節點相等如果具有相同名稱、 公用識別碼、 系統識別碼和內部子集。Two nodes are equal if the have the same name, public ID, system ID, and internal subset.

summary.span: 根據節點的值傳回雜湊碼。

span.span: Returns a hash code based on the value of a node.

returns.span: ，包含節點之以值為基礎的雜湊程式碼。

span.span: A that contains a value-based hash code for the node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作節點的參考識別為基礎。The implementation of is based on the referential identity of the node. 這個方法會計算節點，其屬性和子系的值為基礎的深層的雜湊碼。This method computes a deep hash code based on the value of the node, its attributes, and its descendants.
